title: Best Figma Tools and Plugins for Managing Themes
content: What are the best Figma tools/plugins for managing themes? - The Design System Guide Close Figma # What are the best Figma tools/plugins for managing themes? Romina Kavcic The best Figma plugin for managing multiple themes is Tokens Studio plugin. [https://tokens.studio/] If you are using Material design, check out Material Theme Builder. [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1034969338659738588/material-theme-builder ] The Material Theme builder is built to assist in exploring the possibilities of dynamic color [http://m3.material.io/styles/color/dynamic-color/overview], harmonizing brand colors, and customizing a type scale. All with implementation in mind to bridge designer and developer workflows. You can also use try Themer. [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/731176732337510831/themer] Themer enables you to create and switch themes from your *published* styles in your team library. Themer creates themes from sets of styles. Each set of styles should contain styles with the same name. When you make a selection, the plugin will identify styles which have matching names associated with the theme you selected, and apply them all at once; enabling you to do fast theme switches. ### Articles Making of true multi-brand design system Building an advanced design system for true white-label products with full control over colours, typography and visual styles üîó Read the article [https://uxdesign.cc/flexible-styles-for-multi-brand-design-systems-638f9c25c227] Next question What are design tokens?
